医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
为化妆品中的 Optimer® 粘合剂提交专利Aptamer Group plc 是新型 Optimer® 粘合剂的开发商，旨在促进生命科学行业的创新，今天宣布，该公司已提交专利申请，以保护最近开发的 Optimer 粘合剂序列，用于快速消费品的新颖应用，该序列是其与联合利华的合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Patent-submission-for-Optimerc2ae-binders-in-cosmetic-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Patent-submission-for-Optimerc2ae-binders-in-cosmetic-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a568d355-84ff-463f-944b-df0335c59a8f Wed, 10 Apr 2024 01:15:00 -0400
禽流感传染给人类：了解风险和预防策略欧洲食品安全局和欧洲疾病预防控制中心的综合报告深入探讨了可能促使禽流感病毒进化并可能引发大流行的因素，强调了有效预防和风险缓解策略的“同一个健康”方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Avian-flus-leap-to- humans-Understanding-risks-and-prevention-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Avian-flus-leap-to- humans-Understanding-risks-and-prevention-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f11b015-70af-4ba1-85d9-7585357f4867 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 00:55:00 -0400 Avian flu's leap to humans: Understanding risks and prevention strategies
通过饮食来减轻压力：地中海饮食与韩国婴儿潮一代的压力减轻有关研究强调，韩国婴儿潮一代对地中海饮食的较高依从性与较低的社会心理压力水平之间存在显着关联，这表明饮食模式是老龄化人群压力管理的一个可改变的风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Eating-your-way-to-less-stress-Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-stress-in-Korean-baby-boomers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Eating-your-way-to-less-stress-Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-stress-in-Korean-baby-boomers.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9ed1bce-052d-47e4-9513-b172a8e0a1ec Wed, 10 Apr 2024 00:37:00 -0400 Eating your way to less stress: Mediterranean diet linked to lower stress in Korean baby boomers
新研究揭示生活方式因素促进试管受精成功研究调查了生活方式选择、生育特定的生活质量和辅助生殖技术治疗的成功率之间的复杂关系，为接受这些治疗的夫妇提供了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/New-study-reveals-lifestyle-factors-boosting-IVF-success.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/New-study-reveals-lifestyle-factors-boosting-IVF-success.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1eff77c1-eade-4145-8e15-0d044e0f2b2a Wed, 10 Apr 2024 00:20:00 -0400 New study reveals lifestyle factors boosting IVF success
全球寻求饮食中钠和钾的适当平衡全面审查将全球膳食钠和钾指南与日本的膳食指南进行了对比，强调需要根据文化定制膳食建议，以有效对抗非传染性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/The-global-quest-for-the-right-balance-of-sodium-and-potassium-in-the-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/The-global-quest-for-the-right-balance-of-sodium-and-potassium-in-the-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4e55f81-ef24-4128-acc3-cb6fb3b1e29c Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:59:00 -0400 The global quest for the right balance of sodium and potassium in the diet
Bio-Techne 引用 RNAscope 技术的同行评审出版物超过 10,000 篇Bio-Techne Corporation 今天宣布，Bio-Techne 空间生物学部门旗下的 Advanced Cell Diagnostics (ACD) 已发表超过 10,000 篇引用 RNAscope™ ISH 技术使用和应用的同行评审出版物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Bio-Techne-surpasses-10000-peer-reviewed-publications-citing-RNAscope-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Bio-Techne-surpasses-10000-peer-reviewed-publications-citing-RNAscope-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=250b27e2-98ad-4fe1-8542-be9eccdd6cbf Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:53:00 -0400 Bio-Techne surpasses 10,000 peer-reviewed publications citing RNAscope technology
TMAO 血液水平高可预测未来慢性肾病的风险克利夫兰诊所和塔夫茨大学研究人员的新发现表明，血液中高浓度的 TMAO（三甲胺 N-氧化物）预示着随着时间的推移，未来患慢性肾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/High-blood-levels-of-TMAO-predicts-chronic-kidney-disease-risk-in-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/High-blood-levels-of-TMAO-predicts-chronic-kidney-disease-risk-in-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a142830-9876-4dfc-b14a-5e9ebcd57fa0 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:36:00 -0400 High blood levels of TMAO predicts chronic kidney disease risk in future
母亲糖尿病与儿童多动症风险略有增加有关大规模研究表明，母亲患有糖尿病与后代患 ADHD 的风险略有增加有关，这凸显了神经发育障碍中遗传和环境因素复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Maternal-diabetes-linked-to-a-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Maternal-diabetes-linked-to-a-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df50f1b3-c74b-4f31-802b-14ba4a03fc90 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:31:00 -0400 Maternal diabetes linked to a slight increase in ADHD risk in children
研究显示老年人髋部骨折的生存率比许多癌症还要差牛津大学出版社在 JBMR Plus 上发表的一篇新文章表明，髋部或其他骨折后患者的生存率可能非常低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Hip-fracture-survival-rates-in-seniors-worse-than-many-cancers-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Hip-fracture-survival-rates-in-seniors-worse-than-many-cancers-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c08d037c-b840-429b-be77-d07261624037 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:25:00 -0400 Hip fracture survival rates in seniors worse than many cancers, study shows
研究发现流行的糖尿病药物与甲状腺癌风险无关被称为 GLP-1 类似物的药物在治疗糖尿病和肥胖症方面越来越受欢迎，但有人担心它们可能会增加患甲状腺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Popular-diabetes-drugs-not-linked-to-tropical-cancer-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Popular-diabetes-drugs-not-linked-to-tropical-cancer-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afa7c6b5-1a1d-4416-9d00-18f18189bf74 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Popular diabetes drugs not linked to thyroid cancer risk, study finds
